attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: M.P's Expenses were brought in during the beginning of Parliament when they weren't paid a Salary, but received expenses for Governmental duties while in Office. Now that they receive a good wage, pension etc, and with the reported abuse by some, it's time to end all Expenses Claims.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
